tourBios.exmtStatus: Fully Exempt: # Nearest 50 - 33rd Web.com Tour qualifier at 2012 PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh: Has not started in a PGA TOUR event prior to the 2013 season. Has made two career Web.com Tour starts. 2011: Monday-qualifed for the Chattanooga Classic and T64. 2008: Received a sponsor exemption to the Chattanooga Classic as an amateur but missed the cut.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Led Jefferson County High School to the 2004 state title in golf while winning the individual title...Recorded three wins in college and was a second-team All-American in 2008. Two-time Southern Conference Player of the Year at UTC...Qualified for the U.S. Amateur in 2006 and 2007.
tourBios.personal: Favorite golf memory was going to his first golf tournament with his dad at age 9...Never travels without the Bible...Favorite college team is the Tennessee Volunteers...Twitter account is @jonathanghodge...Favorite athlete to watch is Peyton Manning...Is involved with the Fellowship of Christian Athletes.
tourBios.otherInfo: Played on the Hooters Tour in 2010-12.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour in 2014 is T36th at the Chitimacha Louisiana Open Presented by NACHER.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T29th in Consecutive Cuts on the Web.com Tour.
